title: Braised Cabbage
summary: Braised Cabbage might be just the side dish you are searching for. This recipe serves 4. One portion of this dish contains about 4g of protein, 1g of fat, and a total of 81 calories. For $1.11 per serving, this recipe covers 17% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has tried and liked this recipe. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes around 25 minutes. It is a good option if you're following a caveman, gluten free, dairy free, and primal diet. If you have leek, peppercorns, chicken broth, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 73%. This score is solid. Try Guinness Braised Short Rib Tacos with Guinness Braised Cabbage, Braised Red Cabbage, and Braised Red Cabbage for similar recipes.
